sourceOrganization.name: NIAID GHAVE
sourceOrganization.description: An effective and widely available vaccine will be central to any global strategy to slow and end the HIV pandemic. Recognizing the need for increased cooperation, 30+ international organizations joined forces, forming the Global HIV Vaccine Enterprise (Enterprise), a voluntary alliance of public and private partners committed to working together, while maintaining independent decision-making authority. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/global-hiv-vaccine-enterprise
